name: Minimal Dark
description: 洗練されたダークモードテーマ。目に優しく、集中力を高める
use_cases: クリエイティブアプリ

button.primary: bg-neutral-100 hover:bg-neutral-200 text-neutral-900 font-medium rounded-md px-4 py-2 transition-colors duration-150
button.secondary: bg-neutral-800 hover:bg-neutral-700 text-neutral-100 font-medium rounded-md px-4 py-2 transition-colors duration-150
button.ghost: text-neutral-300 hover:bg-neutral-800 font-medium rounded-md px-4 py-2 transition-colors duration-150

card.elevated: bg-neutral-900 border border-neutral-700 rounded-lg shadow-2xl p-6

input.default: bg-neutral-900 border border-neutral-700 text-neutral-100 rounded-md px-3 py-2 focus:outline-none focus:ring-1 focus:ring-neutral-500 focus:border-neutral-500
input.error: bg-neutral-900 border border-error-500 text-neutral-100 rounded-md px-3 py-2 focus:outline-none focus:ring-1 focus:ring-error-500

badge.default: bg-neutral-800 text-neutral-200 text-xs font-medium px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded
badge.success: bg-success-900/30 text-success-400 text-xs font-medium px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded border border-success-800
badge.warning: bg-warning-900/30 text-warning-400 text-xs font-medium px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded border border-warning-800
badge.error: bg-error-900/30 text-error-400 text-xs font-medium px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded border border-error-800
